name: Ace Hero Voxel Flick N Fly - Lucky Block Zipline Swing Edition
name_original: Ace Hero Voxel Flick N Fly - Lucky Block Zipline Swing Edition
description:
Want to jump between the skyscrapers like a spider hero? Get it for free and be the HERO!
Invite and beat your Online friends!

Ace Hero Voxel Flick N Fly is a fast paced action game!
It is fun and easy to play but hard to MASTER!

>>Your unlocked characters will be saved automatically
>>Saved characters will be loaded automatically
>>Make sure you are logged in to iCloud

> NEW!! Automatic iCloud save!
> Worldwide online leaderboard!
> Unlockable characters
> Funny ragdoll physics
> Voxel graphics
> Power-ups to reach more distance

GET IT - GET IT - GET IT
